TopicTitle: Craft disappears and is destroyed at 69km while at x4 time warp

Articles.Content:
While trying to fly a mission with a rover, I was time warping through the upper atmosphere of Kerbin, and the craft just disappeared and was listed as destroyed. Is this a common bug that anyone else has encountered. The craft was using the new grid fins, 4 on the body of the launch vehicle to provide control during launch. There is no apparent explosion, and no clear reason as to why the vehicle is destroyed.

Also, PAIGE is not a helpful tool, and only adds frustration to situations like this. Please allow me to disable her at your earliest convenience.
